text: Luyang Town () is a town and the county seat in the central Rucheng County, Hunan, China. The town was formed through the amalgamation of Fucheng Township (), Chengjiao Township () and Chengguan Town () in 2012, it has an area of with a population of 65,400 (as of 2012).the area and population of Luyang Town in 2012, according to the result on adjustment of township-level administrative divisions of Rucheng County in 2012 - 湖南省民政厅 湘民行发〔2012〕10号, see xzqh.org (2014-04-02) (对汝城县乡镇行政区划调整 - on adjustment of township-level administrative divisions of Rucheng County) Luyang Town is located in the central portion of Rucheng County, it is bordered by Nuanshui Town () and Tuqiao Town () to the north, Jiyi Township () to the west, Daping Town () and Quanshui Town () to the south, Maqiao Town () to the west.The location of Luyang Town, according to the result on adjustment of township-level administrative divisions of Rucheng County on November 27, 2015 - 《湖南省民政厅关于同意汝城县乡镇区划调整方案的批复》(湘民行发〔2015〕100号), see rednet.cn (Dec-4-2015) The town has 21 villages and 6 communities under its jurisdiction in 2016, its seat is at Jiulong Avenue ().卢阳镇合并新村全部挂牌运行: see Ruchengnews.gov.cn (2016-04-12) ==References== Category:Rucheng Category:County seats in Hunan
title: Luyang, Rucheng
